summary: Completed comprehensive testing of CryptoVault dashboard enhancement with Bybit-style professional interface. Successfully tested login flow, dashboard cards, navigation, and AppLayout integration.

ui_bugs.issue: WebSocket connection to ws://localhost:8000/ws/prices fails - no WebSocket server running
ui_bugs.selector: Console logs show connection refused errors
ui_bugs.note: This is expected as WebSocket server is not configured in local environment

ui_bugs.issue: Loading screens appear during navigation between authenticated pages
ui_bugs.selector: Loading spinner with 'Currently Initializing secure connection...'
ui_bugs.note: May indicate authentication state management issues during transitions

passed_tests: Login with test2@example.com / Test123! successfully redirects to /dashboard
Dashboard displays all required cards: Total Balance, Security, Your Assets, Earn, Referrals
Navigation to all protected routes works: /dashboard, /trade, /earn, /referrals, /security, /settings
AppLayout structure implemented with slim header and sidebar navigation
Dark theme with gold accents consistently applied across interface
Sidebar navigation contains 12+ navigation links as expected
Protected routes properly use AppLayout without Header/Footer bleeding
Welcome animation skip functionality works with localStorage flag
Authentication flow works correctly with backend API
